mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study(studyNum, studyGoal, studyName, studyStatus) VALUES (#{studyNum}, #{studyGoal}, #{studyName}, 0)
INSERT INTO study_member(memberNum, role, studyNum, userId) VALUES (studymember_seq.NEXTVAL, #{role}, #{studyNum}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(*), 0) FROM study s JOIN study_member sm ON s.studyNum = sm.studyNum WHERE userId = #{userId}
